item.title: Brand Content Creator & Editor Wanted For Our Portfolio of E-Commerce Brands - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a 5 Star, highly experienced video editor/creator to join our fast growing E-Commerce team.

We are looking for someone who understands how to create HIGH CONVERTING video ads for Facebook and Tik Tok. Please quote "sliding flaps" when making your application.

The individual MUST understand the process behind creating high converting video ads. We are not here to hold this persons hand and direct every step of the way. They MUST be creative and think outside the box.

We are looking for A-PLAYERS ONLY. If you are highly experienced in video editing and creation for Facebook ads, please apply below. If you are not, please do not apply.

We need to see example of your CURRENT work, not projects from last year or the year before, we want to see your most recent, KILLER work.

As mentioned above, we are not here to hold your hand, so being in touch with the latest trends on social is a MUST.

Potential for FULL TIME role available.

Experienced, A-PLAYERS ONLY!

Thanks,

Hourly Range: $18.00-$80.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 14:11 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:TikTok Video, Copywriting, Social Media Marketing, Facebook Advertising
Skills: TikTok Video, Copywriting, Social Media Marketing, Facebook Advertising
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: 🚨Thumbnail Editor - Youtube - Long Term🚨 - Upwork
item.description:
READ!

We are searching for a long term Thumbnial editor.
We offer a lot of growth potential within the company so we are looking for someone who is willing to climb up the ladder!

Payment:
You'll get 10$ per thumbnail wich means you earn based on performance.

Adaptability:
We are the owners of multiple Youtube channels, all channels work with different styles, and we also start new channels ones in a while wich requires someone who is willing to learn and invest his/hers own time into learning the craft of a specefic niche.

Availability:
We are looking for someone who is broadly available and does not have another fulltime job on the side.

Are you an A-Player?
We are only looking for A-Players; People with  ambition and motivation to excel. They set high standards for themselves and continually strive for excellence in everything they do.

If you want to grow and excell within our company send us a BLANK proposal with only a link to a LOOM Video introducing yourself and speaking about your knowledge on Youtube thumbnials + explaining why you want to work with us.

WANT TO GET HIRED QUICKLY?
Deliver 3 test thumbnials in your cover letter, based on the following 3 channels:
We will not use these thumbnails for anything, you can even put a watermark over it. we just need to see if your able to take over a style.

https://youtube.com/@centraldiscovery34486?si=r7aaEhQyROKQh1dY

https://youtube.com/@beyonddiscoveryofficial?si=XW_k0XeNjOB7M9uV (James’s Webb topic)

https://youtube.com/@matterspace?si=VWF5i9_foQxbgOGa


You NEED to be proficient with and have Midjourney!

I hope to meet you soon, so we can get to the top together.



Budget: $500
Posted On: June 20, 2024 14:08 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Adobe Photoshop
Skills: Adobe Photoshop
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Marketing video creation for AI stock investing - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for help developing marketing videos for an ai startup. The company uses news headlines and ai to predict stock movement, provide users with up to date data, and allow them to gain insights into market movements. The videos will be used as tutorials on the website in addition to in marketing materials for the site.

Please include examples of videos you have created before.

Looking for 4-5 short 30secomd- 1 min videos, and one long 3-5 minute overview video.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$45.00

item.title: Urgent video editing job (2 + hours) - Upwork
item.description:
I require urgent edits and additions to an existing 9 minute travel video.

This will involve creating an intro, creating some basic text on background screens and making a few basic edits to existing elements.

To make the edits, you will need to download the existing video from app.frame.io and apply the edits over the top (no raw file available). No change to audio (this should stay as is).

The job is super urgent and I need someone who can start right now and work through until completion (I expect a couple of hours).

Hourly Range: $10.00-$50.00

item.title: Social Media Marketing Expert for Law Firm - Upwork
item.description:
Social Media Marketing Expert for our Immigration Law Firm

I’m looking to hire a Social Media  Marketing Expert to work alongside our other social media marketing expert who...

1. Has 1,000+ hours past experience working in digital and online marketing on Upwork
2. Can work from 9:00 AM Eastern Standard Time (EST) to 12PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)

You MUST be willing to work during the day in EST time (that could mean at night in your time). If you can't work in EST time, please don't apply.

This will be for an ONGOING LONG TERM work. You will be tasked with creating, planning and managing content, online engagement, tracking analytics for YouTube (editing videos), Website Blog, Media outreach.

REQUIREMENTS
- 1,000+ hours experience working in digital/online marketing
- MUST be available to work in PST time (between 9 AM EST and 12 PM EST)
- MUST have strong writing skills and basic video editing skills.

TO APPLY PLEASE ANSWER
1. What's your most successful Social Media marketing success story?
2. Are you available to work between 9:00 AM EST and 12 PM EST?
3. Answer the following question: 2 + 2 = ?




Posted On: June 20, 2024 14:04 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:TikTok, YouTube, Instagram, Facebook, Social Media Management, Social Media Content
Skills: TikTok, YouTube, Instagram, Facebook, Social Media Management, Social Media Content
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: UGC Video production for personal care/beauty brand - Upwork
item.description:
Project Description: Social Media Video Content for Naples Soap Company

Project Overview
Naples Soap Company, a renowned provider of premium natural skincare and beauty products, is seeking talented UGC (User-Generated Content) providers to create engaging, high-quality video content for our social media platforms. Our goal is to showcase the uniqueness of our products, educate our audience about the benefits of natural skincare, and build a vibrant online community around our brand. Products can be for adults or for children. Parents with children with sensitive skin. Persons with sensitive skin or skin issues such as eczema, psoriasis, rosacea.

Objectives
1. Product Awareness: Highlight the unique features and benefits of Naples Soap Company products.
2. Educational Content: Provide valuable information on natural skincare routines and the importance of using natural ingredients.
3. Community Building: Foster a sense of community and engagement among our followers.
4. Brand Loyalty: Encourage repeat purchases and brand loyalty through authentic and relatable content.

Content Requirements
Video Length: 15-60 seconds for platforms like Instagram Reels, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts; up to 3 minutes for longer educational content on YouTube and Facebook.
Style: Authentic, relatable, and engaging. Content should reflect the brand’s values of natural beauty, wellness, and sustainability.
Formats: Tutorials, product reviews, testimonials, behind-the-scenes, and lifestyle videos.
Quality: High-resolution videos with clear audio. Professional editing is preferred but not mandatory.
Branding: Incorporate Naples Soap Company branding elements subtly and naturally within the content.

Target Audience
Demographics: Primarily women aged 18-45 who are health-conscious and value natural and sustainable products.
Geographics: Focus on the US market with potential for global reach.
Psychographics: Individuals who are interested in beauty, skincare, wellness, and eco-friendly products. Parents with children with sensitive skin. Persons with sensitive skin or skin issues such as eczema, psoriasis, rosacea.

Selection Criteria
Creativity: Ability to create visually appealing and engaging content.
Relevance: Understanding of the Naples Soap Company brand and audience.
Experience: Proven track record of successful social media content creation.
-Engagement: Ability to drive engagement and interaction on social media platforms.

!



Posted On: June 20, 2024 14:00 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Testimonial Video, Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: Testimonial Video, Video Production, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Viral Reels and Interactive Posts - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can transform our raw footage into captivating viral reels that will attract customers. As part of this role, you will be responsible for creating 12 storytelling reels and 12 interactive posts on a monthly basis. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail, a strong understanding of social media trends, and proficiency in video editing software.

Note: I don't use my voice nor my face in the videos.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Storytelling
- Social media marketing
- Creative thinking

Size: Small
Duration: 1 to 3 months
Expertise: Intermediate

item.title: Film Clip Editing - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled film editor to edit a film clip for our upcoming project. The clip needs to be polished and edited to highlight the best moments and create a captivating story. The ideal candidate should have experience in film editing, a keen eye for detail, and a strong understanding of storytelling.

  Responsibilities:
  - Review and organize footage
  - Cut and trim footage to create a cohesive narrative - based on a content brief
  - Add transitions, audio, and visual effects for a professional finish
  - Collaborate with the director and other team members to ensure the vision is achieved
  
  Required Skills:
  - Proficiency in video editing software
  - Creativity and a strong sense of storytelling
  - Attention to detail and ability to work under tight deadlines

Dimensions: 1080x1080 + 1080x1920
Filetype: .MP4
  
This is a small-sized project with only two clips. We are looking for an intermediate-level film editor to join our team.

Budget: $35
Posted On: June 20, 2024 13:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: Sweden

item.title: Experienced Video Editor for Hollywood/Celebrity Niche - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced video editor with a passion for the Hollywood/celebrity niche. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and producing high-quality videos that showcase the glamour and excitement of the entertainment industry. Your main tasks will include selecting and editing footage, adding special effects and transitions, and ensuring the final product meets our clients' specifications. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of storytelling and be able to work independently to meet tight deadlines. Experience with video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro is required.

Skills needed:
- Video editing
- Storytelling
- Attention to detail
- Time management
- Knowledge of video editing software

Description
Video Duration 15-20 minutes
Pay-$15

Join our team and showcase your editing skills in the Hollywood/celebrity niche!

item.title: Instagram Sports Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a video editor who can create captivating videos ranging from 15 to 60 seconds. This job could lead to long-term work.

Here are some examples of the styles we're looking for:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Mz6rLnbEOUU5lPsdBIHcug16lBLy_UL9/view?usp=drive_link

What You'll Do:
Make Engaging Sports Videos: Turn sports clips into professional reels.
Quick Turnaround: Edit videos fast without losing quality.
Work With Our Team: Collaborate and share ideas with us.

What We Need:
Good English Skills: Clear communication.
Instagram Reels Experience: Know how to create popular reels.
Examples of Your Work: Show us your best videos.

Why Work With Us?
Creative Freedom: Use your unique style.
Long-Term Opportunity: Potential for ongoing work.
Supportive Team: Work with people who value your creativity.

When applying, please include your rate for editing content.

Good English Skills: Clear communication.
Instagram Reels Experience: Know how to create popular reels.
Examples of Your Work: Show us your best videos.

Why Work With Us?
Creative Freedom: Use your unique style.
Long-Term Opportunity: Potential for ongoing work.
Supportive Team: Work with people who value your creativity.

When applying, please include your rate for editing content.

item.title: UGC TikToks for Fashion-Tech Business - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a creative, female native English speaker to produce 10 TikToks per month. This role is perfect for someone looking for a side hustle, not a professional UGC content creator, as we are operating on a limited budget while we prove our product-market fit.

Responsibilities:
- Create 10 monthly TikTok videos showcasing our app and speaking about fashion and style topics.
- Develop engaging and creative content ideas aligned with our brand’s voice and aesthetics.
- Collaborate with our team to ensure the content meets our goals and vision.
- All content, topics and scripts will be provided by us.

Requirements:
- Female, native English speaker.
- Passionate about fashion and tech.
- Creative and able to generate unique content ideas.
- Basic video editing skills.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.

What's in it for you:
- Flexible work schedule – create content on your own time.
- Be a part of an exciting fashion-tech startup.
- Opportunity to grow with the company and potentially take on more responsibilities in the future.
- Showcase your creativity and gain experience in the fashion-tech industry.

Budget:
We have a limited budget as we are still proving product-market fit, so this role is ideal for someone looking for a side hustle.

Budget: $250

item.title: Video Editor for Instagram Reels - Upwork
item.description:
Hi!

I'm the owner of a fragrance company, and want to making Instagram a consistent part of my marketing efforts. I've been limping along on my own, but could really use an extra set of hands.

I take plenty of footage, but I don't have the time to cut it together into attention-getting visuals.

That's where you come in! I already have a process mapped out in my head, so I know where I desperately need your help:

1. I need a  video editor to create awesome Instagram reels  by taking my raw footage and turn it into visually stunning and attention-grabbing short videos.

2. I usually map out product focus/themes and record around those. I can upload them into folders that way so you know exactly where to pull from, and I have a content theme calendar so you'll know what to focus on for a given week's content.

3. I don't necessarily need someone to write the captions since those tend to be in my own voice and that part comes easily. The video editing is just a killer on time for me, and I totally know i am NOT the best person to be doing it.

4. Something that's important here is my brand has a pretty distinct voice - you must be able to capture cheeky humor and the high-end quality of my products. I'll make sure you have the footage to do that, but I need your talent in translating it to the visual output!

The perfect candidate will understand Instagram's reel format and trends, and be able to edit multiple videos together seamlessly. I am all about repurposing content as much as possible to save time. I also have CapCut Pro, if that's helpful.

Responsibilities:
- Edit and organize video footage to make engaging Instagram reels
- Add cool effects, transitions, and music to enhance the videos
- Make sure the final videos meet the brand guidelines and quality standards
- Work with me to understand the message and target audience - I am here anytime to answer questions or help make decisions if you're stuck among a few ideas!
- Deliver the edited videos on time

Skills:
- Proficient in video editing software
- Knowledgeable about Instagram's reel format and trends
- Can work under tight deadlines and deliver high-quality results
- Pays attention to detail and has excellent communication skills


Hourly Range: $10.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 13:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Shorts Editor for Car Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled YouTube Shorts Editor to join our car channel focused on showcasing bad drivers, road ragers, and funny moments on the road. As the YouTube Shorts Editor, you will be responsible for editing and producing high-quality short videos that engage and entertain our audience. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to a growing channel and gain exposure in the car community.

Skills required:
- Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Ability to create engaging and visually appealing content
- Strong storytelling and narrative skills
- Understanding of YouTube Shorts best practices

Long term partnership. You will have around 1 short every day or every other day. You will be paid $250 per month with bonuses based on performance.

Budget: $250
Posted On: June 20, 2024 13:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
